hero.subtitle: Travel made simple, safe, and stress-free.

overview.title: Travel doesn't have to be hard.
overview.subtitle: At Royal Transfer EU, we have carefully planned services to meet your every need.

airport.title: Airport Transfers
airport.description: Make your travel easy from start to finish. Our friendly and professional drivers meet you on time at the airport and take you directly to your destination. No waiting, no stress, just relaxing rides for business or holiday trips.
airport.feature2: Friendly drivers who track your flights
airport.feature3: Always on time and ready when you land

private.title: Private Transfers On-Demand
private.description: Need to get from A to B with comfort and reliability? Our private transfer service is designed for travelers who value punctuality, peace of mind, and quality vehicles. Book your ride in advance and let us handle the rest.
private.feature3: Pre-booking required — minimum 4 hours in advance

minivan.title: Comfortable Minivan Rentals
minivan.description: Going somewhere with family or a larger group? Our spacious and clean minivans can comfortably take your whole group together. Rent for one day, one week, or even longer—always easy and flexible.
minivan.feature1: Spacious vans for groups or family adventures

whyLove.title: Why Travelers Love Royal Transfer EU

bookingProcess.title: Book Your Ride in 3 Easy Steps

step1.title: Choose Your Ride
step1.description: Select your service—airport transfer, taxi, or minivan rental.

step2.title: Instant Confirmation
step2.description: You'll quickly receive details and booking confirmation.

step3.title: Enjoy the Ride
step3.description: Relax and let our drivers handle the rest.

faq.title: Have Questions?
faq.a1: Book easily online, through our app, or by phone. You'll receive instant confirmation.
faq.a2: We accept all major credit cards, online payments, and cash payments.
faq.q3: What happens if flights are delayed?
faq.a3: Don't worry! We monitor your flight and adjust pickup time automatically at no extra cost.
